ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities

Class Score

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.josephroque.bowlingcompanion.utilities.Score

  • public final class Score
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Joseph Roque on 15-03-19. Provides methods for determining bowling scores based on user input

      • getValueOfFrameDifference

                                            boolean[] frameToGet)
        Gets the score value of the frame from the balls, depending on which balls were already knocked down in the previous frame.
        Parameters:
        prevFrame - state of the pins in the previous frame
        frameToGet - state of the pins the current frame
        Returns:
        score of the frame, in a 5 pin game

        Gets textual value of ball.
        Parameters:
        pins - state of the pins
        ball - the ball to get the value of
        shouldReturnSymbol - indicates if a symbol should be returned no matter what
        isAfterStrike - indicates if the ball being counted was after a strike
        Returns:
        textual value of the ball

        Returns:
        textual value of the ball
